analysis: The project is a static website about black holes with a cosmic theme. The current theme is dark and space-themed, but it needs to be enhanced with more animated objects, slides, and animated pages to fully align with the event's requirements. The existing CSS file has some animations, but they need to be expanded to include more dynamic and interactive elements related to black holes.

improvements.description: Enhance the CSS file with additional animations for black hole visuals, including swirling effects, glowing elements, and dynamic particle animations to create a more immersive cosmic experience.
Add more animated slides and interactive elements to the HTML structure to support the enhanced animations and ensure all buttons have proper event handlers and styling.
Update the JavaScript file to include event listeners and functionality for the new animated elements and ensure all animations are triggered correctly.
